info.name: No comment [global]
info.description: Removes the comments from most web pages. Cain't read 'em, cain't post 'em, cain't cuss 'em.
info.additionalInfo:
"Ash nazg durbatulûk, ash nazg gimbatul, ash nazg thrakatulûk, agh burzum-ishi krimpatul"
(But should you take leave of your senses you can simply disable the style until your good sense returns.) It's dead-simple, so it sometimes fails magnificently (as it does here, but then how often is a URL used as an element ID?).
